hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "Allah has ninety-nine Names, one-hundred less one; and he who memorized them all by heart will enter Paradise." To count something means to know it by heart

chapter.ara-name: باب إِنَّ لِلَّهِ مِائَةَ اسْمٍ إِلاَّ وَاحِدًا
chapter.eng-name: Allah has one hundred Names less One
